name: HistoplasmosisTestsForHistoplasmaCapsulatumNucleicAcid
title: Histoplasmosis (Tests for Histoplasma capsulatum Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Histoplasmosis by nucleic acid testing.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Histoplasmosis),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
